Info.Description:
Documentation of [TheTVDB](https://thetvdb.com/) API V4. All related information is linked from our [Github repo](https://github.com/thetvdb/v4-api).
## Authentication
1. Use the /login endpoint and provide your API key as "apikey". If you have a user-supported key, also provide your subscriber PIN as "pin". Otherwise completely remove "pin" from your call.
2. Executing this call will provide you with a bearer token, which is valid for 1 month.
3. Provide your bearer token for subsequent API calls by clicking Authorize below or including in the header of all direct API calls: `Authorization: Bearer [your-token]`
Info.Title: TVDB API V4

post.Summary: create an auth token. The token has one month valition length.

get.Description: Returns a single artwork base record.
Returns a single artwork extended record.
Returns list of artwork status records.
Returns a list of artworkType records
Returns a list of award base records
Returns a single award base record
Returns a single award extended record
Returns a single award category base record
Returns a single award category extended record
returns a paginated list of company records
returns list of inspiration types records
returns list of list base records
returns list of movie base records
Our search index includes series, movies, people, and companies.

Parameters.Description: The primary search string, which can include the main title for a record including all translations and aliases.
Parameters.Name: query

Parameters.Description: Alias of the "query" parameter.  Recommend using query instead as this field will eventually be deprecated.
Parameters.Name: q

Parameters.Description: Restrict results to a specific entity type.  Can be movie, series, person, or company.
Parameters.Name: type

Parameters.Description: Restrict results to a specific year. Currently only used for series and movies.
Parameters.Name: year

Parameters.Description: Restrict results to a specific company (original network, production company, studio, etc).  As an example, "The Walking Dead" would have companies of "AMC", "AMC+", and "Disney+".
Parameters.Name: company

Parameters.Description: Restrict results to a specific country of origin. Should contain a 3 character country code. Currently only used for series and movies.
Parameters.Name: country

Parameters.Description: Restrict results to a specific director.  Generally only used for movies.  Should include the full name of the director, such as "Steven Spielberg".
Parameters.Name: director

Parameters.Description: Restrict results to a specific primary language.  Should include the 3 character language code.  Currently only used for series and movies.
Parameters.Name: language

Parameters.Description: Restrict results to a specific type of company.  Should include the full name of the type of company, such as "Production Company".  Only used for companies.
Parameters.Name: primaryType

Parameters.Description: Restrict results to a specific network.  Used for TV and TV movies, and functions the same as the company parameter with more specificity.
Parameters.Name: network

Parameters.Description: Search for a specific remote id.  Allows searching for an IMDB or EIDR id, for example.
Parameters.Name: remote_id

get.Description: returns list of seasons base records

400.Description: Invalid season id, language not found.

get.Description: returns list of series base records
Returns series artworks base on language and type.
Returns series episodes from the specified season type, default returns the episodes in the series default season type

Parameters.Description: airDate of the episode, format is yyyy-mm-dd
Parameters.Name: airDate

400.Description: Invalid series id, episodeNumber is not null then season must be present

get.Description: Returns series base record with episodes from the specified season type and language. Default returns the episodes in the series default season type.

Alias.Description: An alias model, which can be associated with a series, season, movie, person, or list.

language.Description: A 3-4 character string indicating the language of the alias, as defined in Language.

name.Description: A string containing the alias itself.

SeriesBaseRecord.Description: The base record for a series. All series airs time like firstAired, lastAired, nextAired, etc. are in US EST for US series, and for all non-US series, the time of the shows country capital or most populous city. For streaming services, is the official release time. See https://support.thetvdb.com/kb/faq.php?id=29.

SeriesExtendedRecord.Description: The extended record for a series. All series airs time like firstAired, lastAired, nextAired, etc. are in US EST for US series, and for all non-US series, the time of the shows country capital or most populous city. For streaming services, is the official release time. See https://support.thetvdb.com/kb/faq.php?id=29.

tagline.Description: Only populated for movie translations.  We disallow taglines without a title.

TagOptionEntity.Description: a entity with selected tag option

Links.Description: Links for next, previous and current record
